attributes.action: facilitate the construction of a railway station at the Ricoh Arena Coventry..the home of Coventry City Football Club
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a railway line  already  running past the Football ground.Using this railway line would cut down on the travel congestion caused by cars and would mean that supporters would be able to get away from the ground very quickly.  It would also cut down on police time as at the moment they are engaged in controlling the traffic around the ground.
